Actions.Text: REFERRED TO INVESTIGATIONS AND GOVERNMENT OPERATIONS
REFERRED TO INVESTIGATIONS AND GOVERNMENT OPERATIONS

Title: Authorizes the liquor authority to issue temporary liquor permits
Summary: Creates a disabled person retrofit tax credit; provides a tax credit that is equal to thirty percent of the cost expenditures, up to $5,000 for making qualified improvements.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the alcoholic beverage control law, in relation to authorizing the liquor authority to issue temporary liquor permits
